title: Alfie's Christmas
description: Alfie has been charming children and parents for generations, but this is his very first ChristmasA perfect gift, this beautiful storybook invites young readers to join Alfie and Annie Rose for Christmas, and covers every Christmas milestone. Alfie opens his advent calendar and makes cards and presents, he sings carols and decorates the tree, and he writes a special letter to Father Christmas. What will Father Christmas bring on Christmas Day? It's going to be such an exciting day!
author: Shirley Hughes
